attributes.action: Introduce the Albanian language as a GCSE and A Level.
attributes.additional_details:
A study of ‘Shqip’ opens up endless possibilities and opportunities. A rich and sophisticated language, spoken in many varieties throughout Albania.

Ethnic Albanians are spread across the entirety of Europe and beyond, with significant populations in the UK whereby we want to learn more about our language
attributes.background: Enable citizens across the UK to take the Albanian Language for GCSE and A-level.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

It is for schools to decide which languages they teach as part of their curriculum, and for exam boards to consider which languages have sufficient demand for a GCSE or A Level to be made available.
